section.title:
checks posting multiple
accounts payable posting checks for Post A/P Checks
section.para: To post multiple Checks, select the "Post A/P Checks" option. The following screen will appear:
When posting multiple Checks, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Specify the Bank Account for the multiple Checks you want to post.
Displays the total number of unposted Checks.

varlistentry.term:
checks printing journal
check journal printing of Print Check Journal

listitem.para: Select to print the Check Journal.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen without posting a Check, returning you to the application desktop.
Posts the Check, using the specified parameters.
